item.title: rcsgen
item.description: The rcsgen command generates basis function for restricted cubic splines. The command is used by my stpm2 command to fit flexible parameric survival models. It has a number of advantages over Stata’s inbuilt mkspline command, which will be demonstrated in the tutorials below. Using rcsgen Generating splines - use of the knots(), bkknots() and percentiles() options. Using the scalar() option for predictions. Using the center() optin for easier predictions Some issues when orthogonalising.
